summary: Header and UI strings were rebranded to “Adwait Loop” and index.html title updated, but the requested new static logo/wordmark image assets were not added in the diff. The footer also appears to include a new caffeine.ai attribution line not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a new standalone “A” logo mark and matching “Adwait Loop” wordmark and store them as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated at the specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows AppShell.tsx now references the new asset filenames, but no new image files were added (ADDED FILES: none), so the required static assets are not evidenced as created/committed.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed footer attribution text and external link to caffeine.ai ("Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai").
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to update branding strings and header assets; it did not request adding a new third-party attribution link/text in the footer.
evidence: frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx (footer paragraph with caffeine.ai link and "Built with ❤️")
